title: Daaaaam Daniel: Danny MacAskill Would Rather Ride Across a Massive Dam Than Rocks
content:
To most of us, the thought of riding across a narrow, moss-covered wall with a death-drop to one side would be pretty terrifying. To Danny MacAskill, it’s just a walk ride in the park. To check out the new Santa Cruz Vala, Danny checks out some Scottish dams along with his least favorite terrain – rocks.

The post Daaaaam Daniel: Danny MacAskill Would Rather Ride Across a Massive Dam Than Rocks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
